snippet.title: Echo Point Nova - Official Demo Update Trailer | Realms Deep 2023
snippet.description:
Get another look at Echo Point Nova in this latest trailer for the FPS open-world combat adventure game from the creators of Severed Steel. Echo Point Nova is playable in single-player or co-op. A demo update for Echo Point Nova is available now on Steam. 

During a routine research flight, your ship gets shot down over the planet Echo Point. You find the planet infested with a hostile and greedy mercenary force. What are they looking for? Use your grappling hook, hoverboard, and loads of firepower to figure that out.
